name: Santa's Presents
description:
Story

Some of the presents for the children have fallen out of Santa's sack and on to the icy ground of the North Pole! Help Santa collect all the presents and return them to his sack in time for Christmas Day.

Features

Santa's Presents is a puzzle game where you have to fling Santa around using the mouse while trying to collect all the presents on each level, and doing it in the least amount of moves possible. The less moves you complete the level in, the higher the star rating you receive! Can you complete all the levels in the least amount of moves?

Controls

Move mouse - menu interaction
Left button (hold/release) - aim/fling Santa
